people.name: Sarah Chen
people.bioShort: Sarah founded Meantime Studio to focus on residential design that supports how people actually live. Her work emphasizes spatial structure and controlled execution.

people.name: Marcus Tan
people.bioShort: Marcus specializes in spatial planning and project coordination. He brings a structured approach to residential design and site oversight.

people.name: Elena Wong
people.bioShort: Elena focuses on residential projects, with particular attention to storage solutions and material selection that support long-term use.
